issue.title: m.gx.cn
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

5.1.102

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.gx.cn/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, EasyPrivacy, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter, Fanboy's Social Blocking List

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### Other

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals

### Add your comment and screenshots

>[!Note]
> 这个广告怀疑跳转的链接为NSFW内容，我无法确定所以加上了

# 描述
一部分网站没法屏蔽我忍了，而很明显的广告都屏蔽不了，你们过滤库存的都是些啥啊？好好写代码很难吗？一堆垃圾东西呼我脸上把我都搞破防，要不是人在国内我都想把这广告分享给你们看了话说到这里，下面供上截图

# 截图
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9a3217a3-ebfe-48b3-9571-4b4c13dd9c97

</details>

# 解决方案
可以加上下面的过滤条文：
```
##.index-ad
##.index-ad
```



### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition
